snippet.title: PC-9801: Jewel BEM Hunter Lime (English Translation - NOW RELEASED)
snippet.description:
UPDATE: Patch is now available for download here: https://gbatemp.net/download/pc-98-jewel-bem-hunter-lime-english-patch.38169/

Now that 7 episodes out of 12 are translated, here is a preview of episode 2 as a small teaser. The full game will probably be released around october if everything keeps going smoothly.
